DOC.brief_title: A Single-blind , Dose-titration Study KWA-0711 Patients With Chronic Constipation
DOC.criteria: The patient experience few three spontaneous bowel movement per week 6 month prior enrollment . The patient experience one follow sign symptom 25 % bowel movement 6 month : straining , lumpy hard stool , sensation incomplete evacuation Patients secondary constipation cause systemic disorder . Patients organic constipation . Patients receive intestinal resection
